title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 82 - Forms To Be Used For Computation Of Constitutional Tax Limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 82 - Forms To Be Used For Computation Of Constitutional Tax Limits

State Regulations
§ 82.1 - Forms for computation of constitutional tax limits
§ 82.2 - Forms for cities having a population of less than 125,000
§ 82.3 - Form for cities having a population of 125,000 or more
§ 82.4 - Form for counties
§ 82.5 - Form for villages
§ 82.6 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 82

Statutory authority: State Finance Law, §§ 8[14], 54-a[3]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
